Description: Tall ring foot and wall sherd of black-glazed pottery bowl; red-brown micaceous clay; dull black glaze (misfired red in parts of outer face of foot); reserved underside except for part of the resting surface and a blob on underside of floor; large 6-ray "star" and various letters cut on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIII, no. 377)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GS.336)
